title: Forgotten Realms Starlight & Shadows: Gift Set
description: Beloved series by The New York Times best-selling author Elaine Cunningham is now in a gift set! This collection of Daughter of the Drow, Tangled Webs, and Windwalker brings together for the first time three magical books about a member of one of the most popular Forgotten Realms races.
author: Elaine Cunningham
